alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 24 at 1:55PM MDT until October 27 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Sheridan, Western Roosevelt and Eastern Roosevelt Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Expect poor visibility along with icy and snow covered roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized heavy snow bands on Wednesday may produce half inch per hour snowfall rates along with north winds gusting to 30 mph.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt
